thread.title: Emmerdale

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Emmerdale
text: Cain makes his presence very much known at Home Farm during Bernice's engagement party tonight as he rocks up and begins to go through his list of suspects in front of all the guests. Just like an actual murder mystery weekend wha'? Later on, Cain decides he is going to take matters into his own hands though, and comes to the conclusion that the only way to sort this mess is to actually kill Robert and make sure Chrissie takes the fall for it. So dramatic times ahead! And don't forget, it's the flashback episode on Thursday when we finally find out who actually did shoot Robert.
